name: CoeurCoeur
description:
CoeurCoeur is a Twin-Stick Arena Shooter made in (about) 24 hours ! The goal is to defeat enough ennemies to make the boss spawn, and then kill it !

Controls : Arrow-Keys to move, mouse to aim and shoot, click the cross in the top-right corner to quit.

To play the game, download the zip file, extract it and launch Cube.exe

Music credit : David Renda https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/8-bit-adventure/2282
